translated: Hafez Assad was born October 6, 1930 is a Syrian military and state leader who took power following a coup in 1970 and ruled authoritatively for 30 years until his death in 2000.
original: Hafez el-Assad né le 6 octobre 1930 est un militaire et chef d'état syrien qui prit le pouvoir suite à un coup d'état en 1970, il gouverna de façon autoritaire pendant 30 ans jusqu'à sa mort en 2000.
